scripts.preinstall: node -e "if(process.env.npm_execpath.indexOf('yarn') === -1) throw new Error('You must use Yarn to install dependencies')"
scripts.start:visualizer:buildStats: cross-env APP_ENV=development INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true vite --mode development
scripts.build: yarn rm-dist && cross-env APP_ENV=staging vite build --mode staging
scripts.build:visualizer: yarn rm-dist && cross-env APP_ENV=staging INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true vite build --mode staging
scripts.build:buildStats: yarn rm-dist && cross-env APP_ENV=staging INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true vite build --mode staging

scripts.build:prod-beta: yarn rm-dist && cross-env APP_ENV=production vite build --mode beta
scripts.build:prod-beta:visualizer: yarn rm-dist && cross-env APP_ENV=production INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true vite build --mode beta

scripts.lint: yarn lint-js "**/*.{mts,cts,ts,tsx,mjs,cjs,js,jsx,mdx}" && yarn lint-css "**/*.{css,scss}" && yarn prettier .
scripts.lint:fix: yarn lint-js:fix "**/*.{mts,cts,ts,tsx,mjs,cjs,js,jsx,mdx}" && yarn lint-css:fix "**/*.{css,scss}" && yarn prettier:fix .
scripts.storybook: cross-env IS_STORYBOOK=true APP_ENV=development BE_ENV=development storybook dev -p 6006
